original_title: News | Today's latest from Al Jazeera
article_summary:
1. Afghanistan bus crash death toll rises to 79, including 19 children.
2. Is Ukraine closer to peace after Trump's meetings with Zelenskyy and Putin?
3. Senegal introduces 'schools for husbands' to shift gender roles.
4. Israel plans to call up 60,000 reservists to expand war and seize Gaza City.
5. Liverpool's Mo Salah wins record third PFA Player of the Year award.
6. Trump threatens 300% tariff on semiconductor imports, affecting global chip industry.
7. Trump deploys National Guard in Washington, DC, citing crime despite falling rates.
8. Mali's former prime minister charged with embezzlement, remanded in custody.</s>
